snippet.title: Spellbreak Launch Gameplay Trailer | Real Gameplay from Real Players
snippet.description:
Spellbreak has officially launched on all platforms! Download now and Become the Ultimate Battlemage.

✓ PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and Windows PC (Epic)
✓ Cross-progression
✓ Cross-party
✓ Cross-play
✓ Free

Spellbreak is a multiplayer action-spellcasting game where you unleash your inner battlemage. Master elemental magic to fit your playstyle and cast powerful spell combinations to dominate other players across the Hollow Lands. Learn more at https://playspellbreak.com

All footage is real gameplay from real players. Thanks to Desrx, SirDapper, talkohsss, dirtytigerx, and Rush Frog for the incredible highlights!

Join the Spellbreak community:
Discord: https://discord.gg/spellbreak
Instagram: https://instagram.com/playspellbreak
Twitter: https://twitter.com/playspellbreak
Facebook: https://facebook.com/playspellbreak
